referred_to_by.value:
7 supplemental volumes entitled: The supplemental nights.
Ephemera found between pp. 1-2 : Piece of paper with annotation by unknown : note about medication
Ephemera found between pp. 296-297 : Piece of paper with handwritten shopping list by unknown ; card from the American Bible Society with Psalm 121 printed on it
Ephemera found clipped to front loose endpaper : small clipping of an image of Richard Burton
From Georgia O'Keeffe's Ghost Ranch Library.
Illustrations by Albert Letchford, Adolphe Lalauze, and others.
Limited to one thousand numbered sets of which this is number 227.
Page markers found and discarded : tissues : pp. 204-205 ( v. 8 ) ; pp. 190-191 ( v. 9 ) ; pp. 220-221 ( sup. v. 3 ) ; pp. 524-525 ( sup. v. 4 ) ; pp. 238-239 ( sup. v. 7 ).
Printed by the Burton Club for private subscribers only.
Tissues used as place markers were found in v. 8 (p. 205), v. 9 (p. 190), supplemental v. 3 (p. 220), supplemental v. 4 (p.524), supplemental v. 7 (p. 238). Tissues replaced with archival markers.
